name: The Spear: The Planet Savior
description:
You've got an army of spwaning spears to use them to destroy your enemies the invaders, and be sure not to hit the planet or the cute little things with your spears.

The Spear is an easy casual game, but you will need to be patient and precise with your throw of the spear.

With increase of the planet's rotation speed your skills at throwing the spear will show up.
